description.value:
Consisting of specialized reinforcements to the mech’s lower limbs, this system allows a mech to plow past obstacles. The mech treats all @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.2mmspP39EOiog9zD.JournalEntryPage.OpSxLHltqqCYJOfE#difficult-terrain]{difficult terrain} as normal terrain.

Bulldoze (2 PP) The mech can activate this ability when it attempts a bull rush or reposition combat maneuver. The mech gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll, and if the combat maneuver succeeds, the target also takes damage equal to [[@details.tier + @abilities.str.mod]] the mech’s tier plus its Strength modifier.

modifiers.name: Bulldoze 2PP
modifiers.notes: When Bulldoze activated for Bull rush or Reposition combat maneuvers
